name: Robotic Dash Beta - 32 Bits
description:
Robotic Dash is a platform game that is still in development. Currently the game already starts in the phase to be played.

Tips:
When Gravity changes and player moves up, the jump key changes to the bottom arrow on the keyboard.

To exit the game simply press "ESC".

New Features 02/11/2017

In this new update of 11/2/17, new levels are available and a menu is still under construction.
